articles.title: Four dead and several missing after Indian Himalayas avalanche - BBC.com
articles.description: A rescue operation is under way after the avalanche swept away road construction workers in the village of Mana.
articles.content:
A rescue operation has been taking place in the mountain state of Uttarakhand
At least four people have died and several others are missing after an avalanche hit the northern Indian state of Uttara… [+1740 chars]
